item.title: CVE-2022-41136|2024-09-17T00:46:56.074Z -- vladimir%20anokhin -- shortcodes%20ultimate%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability leading to Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in Vladimir Anokhin's Shortcodes Ultimate plugin <= 5.12.0 on WordPress.
